item.title: Defying Trump Executive Order, California Forces Girls Into Basketball Playoff With Boy
item.description: Speedy action from the Department of Education’s Office of Civil Rights would protect girls from playing a boy who dominates girls in basketball.

item.title: South Carolina bill would ban smoking inside cars while children are passengers
item.description: A South Carolina group of senators introduced a new bill this week that would ban smoking in a vehicle with a child 12 years or younger present.

item.title: Elbridge Colby Is The Right Man To Carry Out Trump’s America First Mandate
item.description: Elbridge Colby will actually do what Americans have given Trump a clear mandate to do, and for that reason, the D.C. blob is desperate to stop him.

item.title: Zeldin To Claw Back $20 Billion That Biden’s EPA Dumped Into Leftist ‘Climate’ Groups
item.description: EPA Secretary Lee Zeldin said he reviewed "stunning" documents about Biden's scheme to dump $20 billion into leftist "climate" groups.

item.description: It must spend more for its own defense, as American leaders have warned for years.

item.title: Government Is Wasting Spectra the Private Sector Needs
item.description: Spectrum auctions will accelerate economic development, privatize underutilized government assets, and help pay for DoD’s requested spending.

item.title: Russian officials make ultimatums on NATO, Ukraine as Saudi Arabia peace talks begin
item.description: Russian officials say Ukrainian membership in NATO is a red line in peace talks as they met with U.S. officials in Saudi Arabia on Tuesday.

item.title: Trump Is Right: The States Should Handle Disaster Relief
item.description: State and local leaders, not distant federal bureaucracies, are in the best position to deliver real solutions when disaster strikes.
